mapper.select: SELECT PM_CPCODE AS CPCODE, PM_PRCODE AS PRCODE, PM_USERID AS USERID, CM.CM_UNAME AS USERNAME FROM PM INNER JOIN CM ON PM.PM_USERID = CM.CM_USERID WHERE PM_CPCODE= #{cpcode} AND PM_PRCODE = #{prcode} AND PM_WCODE = '1' AND PM_USERID != #{userid}
SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(SC_CODE,3,4)),0) FROM SC WHERE SC_PRCODE = #{prcode} AND SC_PSCODE = #{pscode}
SELECT*FROM SCHEDULEVIEW WHERE CPCODE = #{cpcode} AND PRCODE = #{prcode} AND PSCODE = #{pscode} AND SCSTCODE = #{scstcode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SM VALUES(#{cpcode},#{prcode},#{pscode},#{sccode},#{userid},(SELECT CM_WCODE FROM CM WHERE CM_USERID = #{userid}),#{utype})
mapper.update: UPDATE PS SET PS_STATE = #{stcode} WHERE PS_CPCODE = #{cpcode} AND PS_PRCODE = #{prcode} AND PS_CODE = #{pscode}
